name: Potion Tuition
description:
We are a group of students working on a game project called 'Potion Tuition', a pixel game where you play as a young witch who's learning how to make potions... Against all odds!

We are currently running a beta test (Thu 28th till Fri 29th) and we hope that you could test our current progress and give us feedback here: FEEDBACKFORM

What can you do?

  • Go to the tanuki shopkeeper and press E to interact with the shop. You can sell and buy items
  • Open inventory with Q

Currently known bugs:

  • Inventory: 
    • You cannot pick up two of the same items, even if you have free space
  • Store
    • The store lets you buy as many items as you want, without running out
  • Options
    • No music yet

There actually isn't currently a lot of gameplay but we are working on adding some features like this:

  • Being able to actually make potions
  • NPCs speak and teacher gives tasks
  • Ryebread
  • And a lot more...

Thank you for showing interest to our project and hopefully you will leave some feedback so we can brew potions better!
